About me

Hi, I'm Yaroslav, a novice frontend developer from Obninsk

I learn from various courses, some books, videos on YouTube with IT topics and applications on the phone (sololearn for example)

I make my webpages on Gulp based on Photoshop and Figma layouts.

I'm going to change my job fundamentally. and go deeper into the field of IT

Basic English, I can read and logically understand what the text says. Can use a translator =)

Of hobbies not related to IT: I play soccer in an amateur league, take part in city competitions, listen to good music, attend concerts

Ready to consider proposals for cooperation and improvement of skills from interesting companies and people

At the moment, my portfolio includes projects based on layouts found on the web and my own projects, which are made in the initial stages of training
